aldrics Brilliant Blamblower was a famous gnomish mechanical device invented by Baldric.
By the , Baldrics Brilliant Blamblower was proudly displayed in the High House of Wonders of Baldurs Gate next to another famous deviceâ€”Gurns Great Gnomeflinger. Both gadgets were considered an inspiration for young gnomish inventors. Young Purfbin Doogrick once attempted to create an invention he thought to be as grand as Baldrics Brilliant Blamblower. However, his Shred-o-Matic 1000 caused shame and destruction in his familys burrow instead.
